text: Arandisa is a monotypic genus of Namibian huntsman spiders containing the single species, Arandisa deserticola. It was first described by R. F. Lawrence in 1938, and is found in Namibia. ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of Africa
title: Arandisa
